value: directions=It's just south of the roundabout where the Highways A10 and A2 (Colombo Road) meet on the western side of the road.
content=This place is good for having Sri Lankan food on a low price. They have hoppers, "short eats" and rice and curry.

directions=Near the bus station: if you go west from the bus station it's the first and last street before getting to Colombo Rd/The Seaside; there are actually big signs on Colombo Rd showing the direction saying

content=This hotel looks a little bit old and the rooms are big and have bathrooms. There is also a restaurant which prices are higher than in local eateries (300-800 LKR), but they have beer (350 LKR per bottle) and liquor.
address=Kalpitiya Road, Thihaliya, Eththale, Kalpitiya, Sri Lanka
directions=On the way from Pulatam to Kalpitiya

content=The Resort is a fusion of a rustic eco-retreat and adventure-park on the banks of the scenic Puttlam lagoon, located in the unexplored north-west coast of Sri Lanka, making it an unforgettable holiday getaway - especially for the adventurous and nature-loving visitor. .
